initializationAction: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"cobblemon:helix_fossil"}]}] add HelixHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"cobblemon:dome_fossil"}]}] add DomeHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"cobblemon:old_amber_fossil"}]}] add AmberHave');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Hiya! I am important doctor. Yes, very much so, indeed.

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Here, I study rare Pok√©mon fossils. All the time, I study.

pages.speaker: npc
lines: You! Have you a fossil for me?

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run clear @s cobblemon:helix_fossil 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run pokegive omanyte level=30');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound minecraft:getpokemon ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.dialogue.set_page('page4');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run clear @s cobblemon:dome_fossil 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run pokegive kabuto level=30');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound minecraft:getpokemon ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.dialogue.set_page('page4');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run clear @s cobblemon:old_amber_fossil 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run pokegive aerodactyl level=30');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound minecraft:getpokemon ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.dialogue.set_page('page4');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Your fossil is back to life! It was Omanyte like I think!

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Your fossil is back to life! It was Kabuto like I think!

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Your fossil is back to life! It was Aerodactyl like I think!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove HelixHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove DomeHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove AmberHave');
q.dialogue.close();
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove HelixHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove DomeHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove AmberHave');
q.dialogue.close();
